lender.name: Jody and Katie
lender.loan_because: We care.
lender.occupational_info: Jody is a lawyer, and Katie is a doctor.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I don't want to watch something on T.V. or read something in the news paper that stirs my heart, then forget about it 5 minutes later. I want to do my part to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a gas station and go to school, so maybe one day I can get a job working with foster care kids and help people with adoption.

lender.name: Steve & Zack
lender.loan_because: I would like to think that I will leave this place a little better than I arrived in it.

lender.name: Astrilia Liscagita
lender.loan_because: I always feel that as human beings we have a moral obligation to help each other in any way we can...by giving to those in need i can make good use of my earning and it makes me feel happy knowing that i can help others to achieve independence... =)

lender.name: Peter and Ruth
lender.loan_because: We are very Blessed and We Care
lender.occupational_info: Physician: I try and make people feel better.

lender.name: JoyOfGiving
lender.loan_because: I love helping people empower themselves.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: http://www.flickr.com/photos/26416096@N00/

lender.name: Ben Ernsberger
lender.loan_because: I lived in Uganda for four months, and I've seen the difference a few dollars can make. I also really like the way money is loaned, not just simply given to the individual, thereby promoting financial responsibilty without inducing welfare mentality.
lender.occupational_info: I use the internet for the distribution of goods and services, mostly in the health and beauty markets.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful and fortunate in my comfortable life and hope that this simple way of giving may contribute to another's survival, comfort, and prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: Simply providing service with a smile to guests as they enjoy their gaming experience.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org is a very real way we can make the world smaller - developing these personal connections around the globe will promote understanding along political, religous and ethnic lines, and create a safer and more peaceful future.

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because:
"I have shewed you all things, how that so labouring ye ought to support the weak, and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus, how he said, It is more blessed to give than to receive." - Acts 20:35
"We can do no great things, only small things with great love." - Mother Teresa

lender.name: Josh,Kristin,Kyle,Kellie
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to bless and encourage others!!

lender.name: Wendy and Michael
lender.loan_because: This is the perfect way to reach out all the way across the world and make a difference. If you teach a man (woman) to fish......
lender.occupational_info: Architect/Relationship Marketing

lender.name: Cor (CNF)
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. Love to help people all around the globe this way ;-)
lender.occupational_info: Food and Beverage manager in a hospital.

lender.name: Duane
lender.loan_because: I am a business owner myself. I know what you go through to get a business started. I just want to make it a little easier for someone to better themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: Organ and tissue donation procurement.

lender.name: Bret
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to get help to someone that needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I help employees manage their online files internally at a large company.

lender.name: Siyamgita
lender.loan_because: a wonderful friend gave us the gift of giving.

lender.name: Leanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a primary school teacher.

lender.name: The Sanchez Family
lender.loan_because: I am fascinated by the stories of these hardworking people and feel this is the perfect way for our family to help better the lives of others around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I work part time as a buyer of food products for export. My husband is a manager at a credit union.

lender.name: Ahmad
lender.loan_because: To help others.

lender.name: Northstar Care Group
lender.loan_because: We believe that loving our neighbours includes those in Uganda.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: No one stands alone in this world. Isn't it becoming increasingly obvious we're all connected on so many levels and that any individual's welfare depends on countless others? I'm happy to be a link in the chain of support for anyone striving to lead a simple, honest, independent and dignified life.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Giving an entrepreneur a fair chance to build their own dignified success is the best solution to poverty.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: It is exciting to see how even a small loan can make a world of difference.
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for manages pharmacy benefits and provides products and services that meet the needs of insurers and their members, allowing those members to take more control of their healthcare needs and costs.

lender.name: kenneth
lender.loan_because: I am making a positive difference in people's lives.

lender.name: George Tam
lender.loan_because: Only through business enterprise can people of the world have a chance to build true financial security and skills; and can be passed on to their children
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses to grow them and find investors where necessary. I also have a publishing company which help individuals to self-publish and tell their story to the world.

lender.name: Edmund
lender.loan_because: I believe we each have a responsibility to help each other around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I develop complex computer software for large corporations and government entities.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: it seems so easy to help out a little. Plus, I find people's stories interesting.
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising, which aims to have conversations with people, trying to influence their choice.

lender.name: Kristen Poulakis
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someones life
lender.occupational_info: I teach all ages how to dance all styles (tap, jazz ballet) I also teach kids how to sing.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I can help some other people with small money.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.occupational_info: I am learning how to feed people so they can be healthy.

lender.name: João
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in software development systems in Portugal with a fantastic team.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: Its the best way to give what I can, and know for sure it is helping someone.

lender.name: Oba's Grand-daughters
lender.loan_because: Oba loaned some money to us!

lender.name: Sacha
lender.occupation: enterprise social computing consultant, author, ge
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship and capacity-building
lender.occupational_info: I help companies help people connect with each other so that they can be more productive, find the people they need, work with people more effectively, and grow their networks.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: God has given to me so that I may give to others
lender.occupational_info: It is so little that i do yet it helps others

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: it's great to empower people.
lender.occupational_info: I help others making their products fun and enjoyable to use.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in all people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps big companies save energy and reduce the carbon impact of their business. My role is managing and organizing the office.

lender.name: Bruno
lender.loan_because: People need to know that by donating, coaching, and just lending support, anyone can become part of the wonderful global family.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in a public clinic where anyone can get immunizations, birth control, treatment of certain diseases, food supplements, and the like.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful oppurtunity to help people who are trying to improve their lives and communities.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: Such a small loan can have a huge impact on someone's life. I also have great respect for people who are trying to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I fix telephones for Verizon

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want the entrepreneurs to be able to help themselves, their community, their families, if applicable, with a little aid from me and others.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be in the workforce, but now, I take care of my granddaughter and grandson, while my daughter is at work. I'm trying to teach my grandkids the meaning of giving and Kiva helps me do just that.

lender.name: Adrien
lender.loan_because: like many people on this planet I want to contribute to reducing poverty in poor countries.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I feel that those who have more have an obligation to share with those less fortunate.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe it is our responsibility to be marked with compassion and consideration for people, animals and the places where WE all live. We are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the environment! I run the S.C.R.A.P. Gallery (Student Creative Recycle Art Program) in Southern California. The Gallery is a place where students of all ages come to learn about taking care of the planet in a creative and artistic way.

lender.name: Bandit
lender.occupational_info: I chase things that move, I sleep and try to escape.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: it can make the world a better place one little bit at time

lender.name: Sandee & Fred
lender.loan_because: We have been in business ourselves and know the struggle faced by these entrepreneurs. Our Christian faith compels us to help.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange cruises all over the world through Expedia Cruise Ship Centers.

lender.name: Carlos Acuna
lender.loan_because: i am in a position to do so
lender.occupational_info: Create environments where people can thrive, create, and fulfill potential.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Giving help to everyone I can brings them up in life for a better life. Life is hard enough, a little boost is a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people new ideas and concepts so they can more fully appreciate life in the world today.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone as I have been helped in the past.
lender.occupational_info: Witnessing to others whose path crosses my path each day.

lender.name: Brigitte
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in the world.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: People with no available credit need help to achieve their goals.

lender.name: M.J.
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I work with executives to help them reach their full potential

lender.name: Wilma
lender.loan_because: What a great idea to give micro loans to individuals who want to start or improve their business, especially to women! When I read that these women want to improve their lives, especially for their children made me want to support them. They believe in the importance of providing an education to their children as a tool to combat poverty! They desire a better future for their children and why not assist them with that dream! The endless possibilities for a brighter future for one child is monumental!
lender.occupational_info: I advise transfer students in Higher Education.

lender.name: Barb & Don
lender.loan_because: Micah 6:8 Joshua 24:14-15 Blessed to be a blessing to others
lender.occupational_info: Don-I help organize and lead people to work together to accomplish a common goal.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: It was a gift. I'm interested in seeing the progress of my loan to the receiptiant.
lender.occupational_info: Office work

lender.name: Yasmine
lender.occupational_info: I write business news for a radio station.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: It connects me to people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in urban environments to address health disparities. I also work in prevention of STD transmission.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: First, it's a wonderful way to provide a bit of help to people attempting to better their lives by improving their conditions, without making them pay money (interest) for that assistance! Also, I feel that it's so important to empower women in all societies if we want to see real peace and an elevated human condition. What a great way to do that!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a first grade teacher. I teach 6 and 7 year old girls and boys to read, write, do math and science, and, I hope, to CARE!

lender.name: James and Dawn
lender.loan_because: People helping people...

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I got a gift certificate; but I also think this is a great way to make a significant difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a doctor's office. I answer the phone, make appointments, give messages, etc. I like my job because I can help people & comfort & encourage them or laugh or pray with them.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It's an easy and rewarding way to help others who are thousands of miles away. A small amount to me can make a huge difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Scott B
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: We believe microfinance is the most effective philanthropy.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing God's love & wealth with our fellow brothers and sisters in our actions
lender.occupational_info: Int'l Logistics

lender.name: Rorie & Matt
lender.loan_because: everybody can use a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: citizens of the world who love travel, art, music & literature.

lender.name: Kristin and Keith
lender.loan_because: I have worked hard and have a good job I love very much. I am at a point in my life where I can afford to give to those that do not has a much as I do and hope that they can find the success and fulfillment that I have.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school science teacher.

lender.name: MaryBeth
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the bounty in my life and I want to share.
lender.occupational_info: Single parent (widow) of a teen. Master's Degree in progress to be a Jungian psychotherapist.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: because everyone should have a nice home.
lender.occupational_info: I am in 3rd grade, and working very hard as a student. I want to be a chef or a teacher when I grow up.

lender.name: Erna
lender.loan_because: Economic and social justice is a global affair. Access to credit is essential to bui;ld wealth anywhere. i want to be part of the solution to our global mess.
lender.occupational_info: I work helping people start and operate businesses in the US. Many of the people I work with are microentrepreneurs (Very small businesses) like most of those on KIVA.

lender.name: Jonathon
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur I understand the difference a loan at the right time can make and I like the fact it goes directly & immediately to the entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I specialise in canadian art with a special focus on helping emerging artists earn a living.

lender.name: Brooks
lender.loan_because: I hope a small loan can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with groups of advisers who guide college students through their years in school.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: We have so much in America. I want to share that with those who are trying to help themselves. I think this is the key to peace in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I spent my working years teaching children (five year olds).

lender.name: Rigel
lender.loan_because: My daily goal is to accomplishing at least one good deed a day...we receive what we give.
lender.occupational_info: Working with kids has taught me that they are usually smarter and less complicated than adults.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: i believe that it's the right thing to do. i feel lucky to be able to give someone a helping hand.

lender.name: Timotao
lender.loan_because: we get by with a little help from our friends.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software so others can build their homes and businesses.

lender.name: Marco & Denise
lender.loan_because: Nice to care

lender.name: Womack/Crispin Family
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I love to help people any way I can!

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to get ahead
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for provides gas service to homes and businesses. I analyze and correct accounts that have billing problems.

lender.name: Sharon-Mass.
lender.loan_because: I want to pass on the gifts I have been blessed with by simply being born in this time and place.
lender.occupational_info: I help elderly tell/publish their life stories and honor their histories by sharing them with the community.

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: I believe people deserve an opportunity to 'light a candle rather than complain about darkness'
lender.occupational_info: Medical doctor and universty professor. Keen on voluntary work.

lender.name: Noah and Gavin
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are lucky enough to be able to. We know our blessings. We admire the resourcefulness of many of these applicants, and if someone can help with so small a donation, why not? We love the idea of Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: Our mom is a teacher. She loves working with children, and making learning interesting. Our dad is self-employed.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: It is a good feeling to help someone who needs help.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because:
Women of our world need a hand up, especially in developing countries.
I look forward to seeing "my ladies" become successful business owners!
lender.occupational_info:
I teach at the college level and sub at the private elementary level, I also write and counsel.
What I do is all "people based", that is where my heart is and will always be.
My volunteer work spans decades and includes working with women and children in crisis.

lender.name: Oren
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Rita C.
lender.loan_because: Jesus tells us to care for and help others.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: -I can -We live in a global economy where everyone deserves a chance to compete and improve their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for the internet and general business communication.

lender.name: Audrey Mariane
lender.loan_because: It makes the difference, that bit of trust uplifts someones life.

lender.name: Gus
lender.loan_because: we want to help people.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Everyone is born into this world needing help. I loan because I believe everyone deserves a chance to make the best life they can for themselves and their loved ones.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: It is my hope that I can help other parents provide the education I was able to provide my children. I respect hard work and think Kiva is an excellent way to show that we are a global economy - and that we care. It makes sense to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker and I work part-time in a small store.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: PPPM major at UofO.

lender.name: perla
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO OPEN A ENGLISH SCHOOL IN BRAZIL, FOR THIS REASON I NEED MORE OR LESS $ 1000,00. THIS A CRISTINA MISSION, I´LL REALIZE THE DREAMS OF THE PEOPLE WITH THE ENGLISH IN YOUR LIFE.

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: I sell seatbelts for industrial vehicles around the world.

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.loan_because: So they can own their own money and feel good about themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Student in 6th grade

lender.name: Liam&Toby
lender.loan_because: It's fun and it's helping people.
lender.occupational_info: We are elementary school students

lender.name: pejman
lender.loan_because: Create opportunities and persuade hard working entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: Accelerating Entrepreneurship in developing countries

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students about business.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I want to see people improve their standard of living and have more time for family and friends.
lender.occupational_info: I design products for the house such as kitchen knives, cooking tools, and pepper mills. I also design train interiors, helping decide the shape and size of the seats, lights, doors, and other aspects.

lender.name: Carrie Day
lender.occupational_info: Carrie is teaches science to 13 and 14-year-old children.

lender.name: Pedro Vapi
lender.occupational_info: Computer Science engineer

lender.name: Danielle & Charlie
lender.loan_because: we love to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I are both geologists for a petroleum company in Colorado.

lender.name: Reva of LA. California
lender.loan_because: I believe in people, we are all one.We all deserve opportunity. Honesty,hard work and ambition I respect very much.It makes huge impact impact on me . I cannot afford much, I wish I could. But I will loan as much and as often as I can , I know every little bit counts. Good Luck & God bless you all. -Reva

lender.name: Jeannette
lender.loan_because: I have raised my three sons, mostly as a single mom, and I like to help women who are trying to help themselves. I was lucky to have an education which gives me the power to control my life and take care of my family. I would like to pay it it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a school teacher who teaches math, reading, history, science, and writing to 11 year old children in the public school system.

lender.name: Rosio
lender.loan_because: anyone and everyone with the ability to help should do it.

lender.name: Felicity
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all that I have been given, and wish to be able to share my blessings in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I give medical care to premature and sick babies.

lender.name: Dirk
lender.loan_because: because I have the assets to do so without problem, and it's the least I can do to try and make the world a bit fairer.

lender.name: birdies
lender.loan_because: It's a small way to make life better for people who have scarcity when I have abundance.
lender.occupational_info: I try to teach boys and girls in school about the places all over the world.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I believe in Muhammad Yunus' idea of harnessing the power of the free market to solve the problems of poverty, hunger, and inequality throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with electronics and computer programming to create smart, fun, and useful machines.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: I loan because I'm pretty fortunate (all things considered), and I feel that I should give a little back.
lender.occupational_info: I help women, men, and children escape violent relationships. I'm a student, and hope to become a counselor someday.

lender.name: Jane & Paul
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to live in Australia where raising credit for business development is not difficult. We would like to help others who are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We are both Architects who design and develop commerical and residential buildings. We also teach architecture at the University.

lender.name: Richie
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with many gifts and because of KIVA, many others like myself can share these gifts directly with others in this world.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: If it were my children in need of a loan like this. I would hope that someone would be out there to help them.. and we are suppose to pay it forward.. so thats what I am doing..
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker.

lender.name: Marika
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate to be in a position to help people make their dreams come true and I'll do as much as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist.

lender.name: Stewart
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair go

lender.name: terry
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed
lender.occupational_info: design construction equipment

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: it's gratifying to help real people and, in a small way, address the global issue of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help immigrants and refugee adjust to life in the US

lender.name: Keri & Tony
lender.loan_because: We want to help.

lender.name: Homebirthers
lender.loan_because: We are a group of mothers who have our babies at home, naturally. We wanted to do something charitable as a group.

lender.name: T & D
lender.loan_because: we have the obligation to assist those less fortunate in improving their lives.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I like helping individuals directly. These small amounts of money make a big difference in countries far away. Kiva brings them close.

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate and when I checked out the website I thought it was really cool. I wanted to help someone who was very close to meeting their goal.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 7th grader in Littleton, CO. I play basketball and baseball

lender.name: Crezette, Australia
lender.occupation: Trainer of assistant dogs for the disabled
lender.loan_because: I am on an Australian Disability Pension and this would be a fortune to Kiva borrowers. So, I wanted; with my Gift Voucher, to help.
lender.occupational_info: Disabled people need to have the freedom to lead a fulfilling and independant life as possible. An assistance dog gives them a choice . I also train homo sapiens for pet dogs. No fees are charged hence the Gift Voucher.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: Everyone on this planet should be given a chance to have success.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I've traveled and realize that although I live in the U.S., I'm still a citizen of the world. Helping people get started in a business may inspire them to help others someday too. Hopefully, lighting one little fire will keep it going around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help prepare our community for disasters including earthquakes, tsunamis, winter storms, wildland fires. It's another case of helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: nancy
lender.occupation: mother, grandmother, part of the world\
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to live in a country where I have been able to see my family thrive. I want my grandchildren to learn about the world and the great satisfaction that comes from helping others better their lives.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I love helping those who are prepared to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Managing the design and construction of major buildings

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I HAVE BEEN GIVEN MUCH
lender.occupational_info: I SELL MONEY

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in need. I am an entrepreneur and I want to help other women entrepreneur's.
lender.occupational_info: I work at Lander University. I am the liasion between the university and school districts. I place students in schools for thier field experiences.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: we are all brothers and sisters sharing our Earth
lender.occupational_info: sharing my knowledge to help others

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people!

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to help change lives!
lender.occupational_info: I lead a large team of accounting and finance people for a big food service company. We feed people!

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I feel better knowing I'm helping someone to get a good start, like many people helped me in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I plan, organize and execute tests of ordering systems and the data that flows between them to ensure that telecommunications services can be successfully provided to businesses around the world.

lender.name: Volcano
lender.loan_because: I started a woman-owned business and am inspired by some of the people starting their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Earth scientist and have been studying polar climate change issues

lender.name: Fr. Antonius Luluk
lender.occupation: priest and director of socio-economic development

lender.name: Denise Wakeman
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to own my own successful service business. I want to share the fruits of my success and help other entrepreneurs be successful as well.
lender.occupational_info:
I am Founder of The Blog Squad and an Online Marketing Advisor. I have been using the Internet with great success as a marketing tool since 1996 and am an expert at helping authors, speakers, service professionals, and small business owners leverage blogs for their business, as well as strategically use social media tools to boost online visibility to get more traffic, leads, clients and opportunities.
I write regularly on 3 marketing blogs, am a contributing author on SocialMediaExaminer.com, have co-authored several blogging programs and frequently speak at conferences and workshops about business blogging and how to gain expert status through social marketing. I have been quoted in the Wall Street Journal, The Huffington Post, Newsday, Canada’s National Post, FastCompany Online, as well as many other on and offline publications.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate the me.

lender.name: Ed
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help other people and let's me use my contribution over and over! Also, I like to see who I'm helping and learn about their activities, something very difficult with most charities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach research methods and statistics. I also consult in those areas

lender.name: Mattea and Piers
lender.loan_because: It doesn't matter if it's $25 or $250, it still makes a difference in someone's life. Also, helping someone in need is extremly rewarding.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I feel sorry for the people who have less then me.My mum often says no when i ask for something new and she says think of the poor, that has inspired me.I think everyone should have a great life.THANKYOU
lender.occupational_info: I am a primary school student and I like and am good at literacy.

lender.name: Cathie and Timon
lender.loan_because: We loan because it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We study human diseases to better understand how they work and to find new treatments.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Nicola
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to make a big difference in someone's life! I am not wealthy, but it makes me feel like I can give a helping hand to women who are trying to help their families. I am a dressmaker, so I usually loan to dressmakers in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a home improvement chain, processing returns to vendors and trying to recycle what I can to lessen the impact on the environment and reduce waste to landfills.

lender.name: Shannon and Julie
lender.loan_because: We want to help make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people selling, fabricating, fitting, and dispensing eyewear. Julie heads the revenue assurance department, a division of billing administration.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: It's cool to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the 9th grade.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I've started my own business, so I have a great deal of respect for all these entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I try to find new ways to use the internet to entertain and inform. Yes, there are a lot of people doing it, but one more can't hurt.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: RK & Tina
lender.loan_because: Respect for, and belief in, small business owners and entrepreneurs worldwide.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: The empowerment of business success can transform attitudes and outlooks.
lender.occupational_info: I measure business health and help people understand what my reports mean.

lender.name: Mich
lender.loan_because: I am from the US, but I grew up in Latin America. I have been privileged to travel to many countries in South and Central America, the Caribbean, Africa, and Europe. Additionally, I am an entrepreneur and am in the process of starting my own business.

lender.name: Val
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed and would like to be a blessing to someone else.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: To get a better rate of return while helping people who need the money at the same time.

lender.name: lily
lender.loan_because: I'm happy to help anyone that needs it.

lender.name: ACU SIFE Team
lender.occupational_info: SIFE (Students In Free Enterprise) is a global non-profit organization active in more than 40 countries. SIFE is funded by financial contributions from corporations, entrepreneurs, foundations, government agencies and individuals. Working in partnership with business and higher education, SIFE establishes student teams on university campuses. These teams are challenged to develop community outreach projects that reach SIFE's five educational topics: market economics, success skills, entrepreneurship, financial literacy, and business ethics.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need, and this is my way to give back. I am blessed in this life and met more wonderful people around the world than I can count.
lender.occupational_info: Rebuilding communities broken by war or conflict.

lender.name: Corie,Dan,Steph
lender.loan_because: CORIE - I LOVE people. It's soooo exciting to help make a difference! DAN - Because I care. STEPH - It feels good!
lender.occupational_info: I work with children in the school system who require assistance :)

lender.name: Maddie
lender.loan_because: I think everybody deserves a chance to do something with their life.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I believe kindness needs to be given to everyone, everywhere.

lender.name: Stephen & Kim Courtney
lender.loan_because: We were given a gift certificate. We are very happy to help a little.
lender.occupational_info: Illustrator: Creates artwork Piping: Designs pipe layout on the computer.

lender.name: Teck Jung
lender.loan_because: I help people change their life so they can change the world.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Investing even a small amount to help small-scale entrepreneurs in the developing world succeed and contribute to their local economy seems to be right way to go when so much else has failed in the past.

lender.name: Odette
lender.loan_because: this wonderful organization has touched me deeply.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I believe this organization allows me to personally empower individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I help raise money from companies and wealthy individuals in order to provide care for deaf children, disabled children, and homeless men and women.

lender.name: Madonna
lender.loan_because: small loan may help better another person's status and assist in global economy in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: Assists with improving heathcare delivery for mostly geriatric members of our HMO.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: I am an inactivist.

lender.name: Dharmesh
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be able to serve human community.

lender.name: Zanne
lender.loan_because:
Every helping hand makes the world a kinder place, makes other people part of an 'us' and not a 'them' - and that can't ever be a bad thing.
This isn't about giving so much as it is about sharing. Not charity, but community.

lender.name: Fabio
lender.loan_because: i believe that entrepeneurship is the best way to help people and with my poor assets i can help more than one person

lender.name: GORDY
lender.loan_because: IT MAKES YOUR HEART FEEL "GOOD".

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to be able to do what I do and see the many cultures of the world
lender.occupational_info: I look after old people to allow them a better old age and death.

lender.name: Carlo
lender.loan_because: I'm a lucky guy

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky in life and would like to pay it forward!

lender.name: Ruud/Annette
lender.loan_because: We believe in structural solutions. By supporting a small business,independence is created. Maybe more people in the neighbourhood can profit by being employed in the business for example. This way, the money goes straight to where it is needed. Everybody deserves a chance and mall solutions can lead to big opportunities for people in need. We've seen a lot of places in the world where help is needed. It's our way of trying to contribute and make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Ruud works for a company that delivers coffeemachines to various companies. Annette is a teacher in primary school.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: zhen
lender.loan_because: A pink elephant with wings in a gorrilla outfit told me to fly fly and then swim and then fart and then eat some food but i told it NO i will lend money to kiva instead...

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small part of a large retail store.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I'm intereseted in helping women around the world to be independant. I believe in empowering woman to achieve their goals!

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: In my travels I am aware of the need to extend a helping hand when possible.We are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a teacher of high school and a coach of girls sports for 34 years. Education-learning-and the students personal validation of themselves is my passion for young people to embrace.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Monkey
lender.loan_because: I received a gift and thought I could help some other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a grade five student who has a brother who is seven years younger than me. I love to go to school and be able to learn about new and fun things everyday!! I also love to do crafts and be creative with anything I can find.

lender.name: Ben Orsburn
lender.loan_because: I want to give a hand up, rather than a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: Scientist

lender.name: Jaci
lender.loan_because: I look around my house and I see it full of things that we take for granted and it's time to help someone else who isn't so fortunate.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I believe it's important to help people build on their ideas and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student currently but I have been working for over 25 years in the software industry designing and marketing products. I have worked with small business owners for many years. I enjoy helping women start or grow their own businesses.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I feel i have everything i need - so why not help others get what they need.
lender.occupational_info: LEARNING

lender.name: Smoku & Syrenka
lender.loan_because:
We loan because we are determined to eliminate the sweatshops around the world.
If the world leaders will not, we the people will!
lender.occupational_info:
Smoku is a media designer, who creates media for print, Internet, audio/video. In his spare time, he composes and plays music.
Syrenka is a crisis counselor who answers the suicide hotline on the graveyard (midnight) shift.

lender.name: Christine A
lender.loan_because: we need to give help to all who need it worldwide to promote peace and love!

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I have a wonderful boss who believes in the joy of giving. She gave me the gift of a kiva gift certificate so I could experience the wonderful opportunity kiva provides.
lender.occupational_info: I work with young children.

lender.name: Rudy and Ika
lender.loan_because: I can't help myself.

lender.name: Lynn O
lender.loan_because: I want to help others prosper as I prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who struggle so that they have a better chance for success. http://mail.gsn.k12.oh.us/~lodell/015E0FF0-007582A0-015E0FF0

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps volunteer in Paraguay and I know the importance of helping at the grassroots level
lender.occupational_info: I am retired.

lender.name: Troy-Skott
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Cooperative finance - credit unions - are not-for-profit banks. They help people save and borrow by paying better rates on savings, having less fees and charging lower rates on loans.

lender.name: Klaas
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur myself and want to help others with their ideas.
lender.occupational_info: Managing my own start-up in Germany (RFID electronics)

lender.name: ravi
lender.loan_because: Most in this world are born into poverty, through no fault of their own. However much they desire to change it, they lack the funds to do so. I have been fortunate enough to do something about it with Kiva's guidance. Through small contributions from many like myself, we CAN change the world one person at a time. I love that.
lender.occupational_info: I paint walls.

lender.name: Farieza
lender.loan_because: I can help to empower someone.

lender.name: diane
lender.loan_because: give people an opportunity that they otherwise wouldn't have
lender.occupational_info: i've worked in a family owned book- store for over 30 years.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: i know it can change lives

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Just to want to help someone who really needs the money.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I absolutely love this model for socioeconomic development. I often travel to Africa, where I witness first hand the living conditions and lack of basic necessities like safe drinking water, food, access to medical care and safety/security. I believe that NGO's like Kiva are the key to solving many of the problems in developing countries. The design of the website is fantastic and people love to see how their investment is having a positive impact in the lives of others. Kudo's to Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I work in aviation.

lender.name: laura
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Stephenie
lender.loan_because: loans change lives.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: Helping Army veterans obtain medical care

lender.name: Benji
lender.loan_because: Kiva Rocks!

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to use their skills without unnecessary financial obstacles.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student studying Mechanical Engineering.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Gonzalez Family
lender.loan_because: We loan because we seek a more just world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with hurting relationships heal.

lender.name: Noaman
lender.loan_because: I feel if we loan we can improve the lives of many people around the world.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: when people are self-sustaining, the impact on the their world and the world around them is huge and echoes through the generations.

lender.name: Jammi
lender.loan_because: it gives me a sense of giving back to the community.
lender.occupational_info: I set policies for my organisation- an Islamic bank in Kuwait

lender.name: Judson
lender.loan_because: Thanks to a gift certificate from friends, I was able to begin participating in what I had thinking of getting into.

lender.name: Tanner
lender.loan_because: The only way to make a real economic impact on people's in developing countries is to start from the ground up through grassroots lending. A country is only as strong as the people who work in it.
lender.occupational_info: I study sociology at the University of Montana in Missoula, Montana.

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: I believe that this type financing can improve lives and build self sufficiency and reduce poverty. I loan because I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am an educator in the Christian church and I teach at a local community college.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: People don't need handouts nor do they want them in most cases, this is a great way of helping people accomplish their goals and dreams

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Because a little girl spoke to me once in Swahili, and I understood.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a university researching how to create a more sustainable platform for ethical international engagement.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I want to see others become independent in what they love.
lender.occupational_info: I am a painter/designer/teacher
